mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_TERM (ID, USER_ID, TERM_NAME, ACCEPT_DATE, MEMO) VALUES ( NEWID(), #{vo.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.termName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.acceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vo.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as data_count FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.MEMBERS WHERE MEMBERS_ID=#{rocId} AND ESERVICE_JD.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(MEMBERS_PASSWORD)=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USERS set online_flag = 'Y' WHERE LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId})
UPDATE ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USERS SET LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT +1 WHERE LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId})
UPDATE ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USERS SET LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = 0, LOGIN_TIME = SYSDATETIME() WHERE LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 CASE R.DIV_ROLE_ID WHEN 'IC_PERSONNEL' then 4 WHEN 'CHANNEL_LEADER' then 3 WHEN 'BRANCH_LEADER' then 2 WHEN 'GENERAL_PERSONNEL' then 1 WHEN 'ADMINISTRATOR' then 5 ELSE 1 END FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ENTITY U INNER JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ROLE UR ON U.ID = UR.USER_ID INNER JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.ROLE R ON UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID WHERE U.ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CHARINDEX(R.DIV_ROLE_ID, 'ADMINISTRATOR,IC_PERSONNEL,CHANNEL_LEADER,BRANCH_LEADER,GENERAL_PERSONNEL')

SELECT DISTINCT UD.BRANCH_ID branchCode, D.BRANCH_ID agentCode FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_DEPARTMENT UD INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT D ON UD.DEP_ID = D.DEP_ID WHERE UD.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.BRANCH_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT D.BRANCH_ID agentCode FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_DEPARTMENT UD INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT D ON UD.DEP_ID = D.DEP_ID WHERE UD.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.BRANCH_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT D.BRANCH_ID agentCode, UD.BRANCH_ID branchCode FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_IC UD INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEP_ID = UD.DEP_ID COLLATE database_default WHERE UD.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UD.BRANCH_ID IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT D.BRANCH_ID agentCode, '' branchCode FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_IC UD INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEP_ID = UD.DEP_ID COLLATE database_default WHERE UD.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UD.BRANCH_ID IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT U.LOGIN_SIZE serialNum, UD.BRANCH_ID branchCode,D1.BRANCH_ID agentCode FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ENTITY UE INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_DEPARTMENT UD ON UE.ID = UD.USER_ID COLLATE database_default INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USERS U ON UE.USERNAME = U.USER_ID COLLATE database_default INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT D1 ON UD.DEP_ID = D1.DEP_ID COLLATE database_default WHERE UE.ID = #{userId}
